mdRecord.dcterms:creator: Pole, Edward
mdRecord.dcterms:description: Encloses list of 15 volumes of Journals of the British House of Commons; National Library might acquire them; believes they originally belonged to Dr. [Benjamin] Franklin; volumes are full folio, half binding, slightly worn. [Enclosure, same date, list of books].
mdRecord.dcterms:subject: Franklin, Benjamin, 1706-1790
Jefferson, Thomas, 1743-1826--Correspondence
mdRecord.dcterms:title: Letter, 1804 September 20, Philadelphia, [Pennsylvania] to Thomas Jefferson, n.p.
